CustomField.formula: IF (ISPICKVAL(SPO_BriefName__r.ApplicationSource__c , "SPO"), IMAGE (SPO_BriefName__r.SPO_BaseSKURefmodelSKU__r.SPO_ImageLink1FrontView__c ,"Picture not available"), IF(ISBLANK(TECH_Product_Img_1__c), IMAGE ( Fuild_Image_Packshot__c ,"Picture not available") & " " & IMAGE ( Fluid_Image_Font__c ,"Picture not available") & " " & IMAGE ( Fluid_Image_Back__c ,"Picture not available") , IMAGE (TECH_Product_Img_1__c,"Picture not available") & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(TECH_Product_Img_2__c),"",IMAGE (TECH_Product_Img_2__c,"Picture not available") & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(TECH_Product_Img_3__c),"",IMAGE (TECH_Product_Img_3__c,"Picture not available") & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(TECH_Product_Img_4__c),"",IMAGE (TECH_Product_Img_4__c,"Picture not available") & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(TECH_Product_Img_5__c),"",IMAGE (TECH_Product_Img_5__c,"Picture not available") & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(TECH_Product_Img_6__c),"",IMAGE (TECH_Product_Img_6__c,"Picture not available") & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(TECH_Product_Img_7__c),"",IMAGE (TECH_Product_Img_7__c,"Picture not available") & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(TECH_Product_Img_8__c),"",IMAGE (TECH_Product_Img_8__c,"Picture not available") & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(TECH_Product_Img_9__c),"",IMAGE (TECH_Product_Img_9__c,"Picture not available") & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(TECH_Product_Img_10__c),"",IMAGE (TECH_Product_Img_10__c,"Picture not available")) )
CustomField.label: Product Image
